section.34: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten

hadiths.text: Abu Tha'laba al-Khushani reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) prohibited the eating of all fanged beasts. Ibn Shihab said:I did not bear of this from our 'Ulama' in the Hijaz, until Abu Idris narrated that to me and he was one of the jurists of Syria
